// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipLeft[18] = {
	10, 6,
	59, 11,
	62, 15,
	63, 22,
	60, 26,
	5, 28,
	0, 21,
	1, 11,
	10, 6
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipLeft[18] = {
	0.153846f, 0.162162f,
	0.907692f, 0.297297f,
